meta.title: OTP Ready-to-Use services: Self-verification passwords | ThaiBulkSMS
meta.description: The OTP Ready-to-Use messaging service sends confirmation messages validating oneâ€™s own identity for security in online transactions.

HeroSection.An <span>OTP transmission service</span>:
An OTP transmission service that is ready to use
, increases security and does
not require additional programming.
HeroSection.This feature is only available for the <: This feature is only available for the Corporate Package.

SmsSection.Easy checkups: in only a few clicks,<br/:
Easy checkups: in only a few clicks,
the OTP can be sent.
SmsSection.You can send OTP self-verification messa: You can send OTP self-verification messages to increase customer security without writing additional programs. Simply set the values for only a few steps, and a code will be ready for use with the API, which quickens Developer workflows.
SmsSection.Immediately test the ready-to-use OTP tr: Immediately test the ready-to-use OTP transmission system

SimpleIconSection.The OTP message can be set as desired: The OTP message can be set as desired
SimpleIconSection.Your business name can be set as desired: Your business name can be set as desired
SimpleIconSection.The number of digits can be set as desir: The number of digits can be set as desired
SimpleIconSection.The message Template can be set as desir: The message Template can be set as desired
SimpleIconSection.The password Expiration time can be set: The password Expiration time can be set as desired
SimpleIconSection.The system can function in a variety of: The system can function in a variety of languages.
SimpleIconSection.Learn more about the OTP API: Learn more about the OTP API

TrackSection.Know the full confirmation status of eve: Know the full confirmation status of every entry.
TrackSection.OTP password self-confirmation statuses: OTP password self-confirmation statuses are fully viewable for every entry, whether they are successful or have expired.
TrackSection.Operation of the OTP transmission system: Operation of the OTP transmission system can only be used on the Corporate SMS package
TrackSection.If you have your OTP, you can connect wi: If you have your OTP, you can connect with API as well.

ctaSection.Send OTP with a ready-to-use system that: Send OTP with a ready-to-use system that does not require time wasted in programming.
